MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the L31 and L32 postcode areas of Liverpool, affecting properties in Melling, Kirkby, and surrounding areas. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, and we are working to restore power for those customers still off supply. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of further network investigations and our team are now working to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by Midnight. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:13PM on 24th April 2021.
